component.data: Be.page("calendar-page",function(){var container=$(this).find('div#calendar');container.beDatePicker({container:container,full:true,eventDays:['2018-09-30','2018-09-22','2018-09-23','2018-09-26']}).on('dateSelected',function(e,date){console.log('dateSelected='+date.format('YYYY-MM-DD'));}).on('yearSelected',function(e,date,setEvent){var newYear=date.format('YYYY');var newMonth = date.format('MM');var arrEvent=[newYear+'-09-30',newYear+'-09-22',newYear+'-09-23',newYear+'-09-26'];setEvent(arrEvent);console.log('year=' + newYear + ',month=' + newMonth);}).on('monthSelected', function (e, date) { console.log('monthSelected=' + date.format('YYYY-MM-DD')); });});
